name: yyyyy- Gmail - NtmSmlLift
description:
ATTENTION!!!
The development of this script is completely stopped.
In the future I don't know if I will continue or do some new from scratch.
The script is OUTDATED!

This is NOT a Skin for GMail.

Site:
https://gmail.com

Objectives:
- The pursuit fo vertical space savings without sacrifice any information.
- Some small and simple reorganization of the inbox zone for a better horizontal space distribution.
- Hide ads and use that space for useful info.
additional_info:
########## (v1.59) ##########
- Sorry for this update, it's just to pause/archive the script for now.

########## (v1.58) ##########
- No more code to make a smaller 'Google Top Navigation Bar'. Use my ' style 56265 ' style for that.
- Style renamed.
- Kill the f***ing new horizontal ads!

########## (v1.57) ##########
- Smaller 'Google Top Navigation Bar'.
- New position for the 'Used Space Info'.

########## (v1.55) ##########
- Very very small change in SideBar line height.
- Colorize, again, some more things on mouseover.

########## (v1.53) ##########
- Issue in v1.52 FIXED!

########## (v1.52) ##########
- Color on mouseover in new Window Mail view Action Links REMOVED, because it conflicts with every thing that are underlined.

########## (v1.51) ##########
- Colorize even more things on mouseover.

########## (v1.50) ##########
- Complete rework (100%) of the code.
- Many small tweaks, rearranges and corrected small bugs.
- Colorize a bunch more things on mouseover.

########## (v1.01) ##########
- Fix position of "deleted message in this conversation" info.

########## (v1.00) ##########
- Remove extra space in the 'reply-zone' text area.

########## (v0.99) ##########
- Kill ads, reposition action links and small tweaks in mail/message zone.

########## (v0.70) ##########
- Colorize some more things like on buttons (only on mouse hover): Google Apps links, Google Apps menu, User, Settings and Sign out, Help, Mail and Contacts, Tasks, SidebarNavThings, SidebarNavMoreMenu, NewGroup and ImportContacts.

########## (v0.69) ##########
- Even more vertical space gain!

########## (v0.68) ##########
- 1st public release.

--------------------------------------------------
Some features...
- Hide invite box.
- Extreme gain on vertical space.
- Color on buttons mouse hover.
- Color many other things on mouse hover.
- Slim buttons and input search boxes.
- Small redistribution on the horizontal space in the inbox zone.
- Small height reduction to all of sidebar items, included the chat zone.
- No more ads zone.
--------------------------------------------------
